OrgName.entry: PRINCES HOUSE CARE AND SUPPORT CENTRE

Desc.entry: 10 bed unit offering long-term, short-term and respite care to people with physical disabilities and learning disabilities aged 18 years and over. Primarily focusses on rehabilitation for people affected by neurological conditions, spinal or brain injuries. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
